author: bencomic

left.text: ...until finally I stuffed jefferson back into the bunker, zipped up and walked away without washing my hands

right.text: jefferson is the personal name of my penis

left.text: I've not heard that euphemism before

right.text: but it's so much better than johnson or spike or mealymouth

left.text: named after the president, i guess

title: naming is the origin of all particular things
